CONFIG.instructions: Describe the purpose of the experiment and any directives for model output here.
general_directives: Give further instruction to all agents in this list
It can be any number of instructions

AGENTS.model_name: The model of the agent(i.e. gpt-4o, claude-3-opus-20240229)
AGENTS.agent_description: A simple description for the agent
AGENTS.temperature: An integer that controls the randomness/creativity of the agent
AGENTS.max_completion_tokens: An integer that controls how long the agents response is
AGENTS.harmonizer: A boolean that determines if this agent will be the harmonizer
agent_directives: Any futher directives that can be specialized on a per agent basis
This can be any number of directives
